products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Steel Roller Blind

The simple yet bold effect of this leaf print motif is depicted on both sides of this tough, pvc roller blind, reflecting your funky interior style outside. The easy stone colour is ideal to blend with subtle dcor and the generous curvy modern double-sided leaf pattern is a timeless choice.
